title: Ayvedic Cold-Pressed Mustard Oil (For Body/Head Massage)
excerpt: Traditional warming mustard oil for stimulating circulation, ideal for Kapha and Vata conditions with proper guidance.
content:
## What Is This Mustard Massage Oil?
A cold-pressed, unrefined mustard seed oil traditionally used in Ayurvedic body and head massage for its warming, stimulating qualities.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Mustard oil heats, stimulates circulation, and moves stagnant Kapha. It supports muscle warmth and flexibility in colder seasons.

### Key Benefits
- Stimulates local circulation.
- Provides warmth to cold, stiff muscles.
- Suitable for Kapha or Vata conditions when used properly.

## Ingredients
- 100% cold-pressed mustard seed oil

## Usage Instructions
- Warm lightly and apply to body or scalp before shower. Avoid sensitive areas.

## Packaging
- Dark glass bottle to preserve potency.

## Safety & Consultation
- Not suitable for Pitta sensitivity, eczema, or broken skin. Patch-test before first use.

## Why Choose This Oil?
A classical warming oil for winter rituals and grounding massages.
